item.description: what we be about citySec was formed in the summer of 2018 to provide an ongoing outlet for the growing cybersecurity demand and presence at City College. citySec is a collective of cybersecurity enthusiasts. ðŸ’» citySec is for everyone. ðŸ‘¥ citySec is fun… ðŸŽ¡ so have fun with it! ðŸŽ‰ slack Join our slack channel to ask questions or discuss whatever it is you wish to talk about. item.title: events
item.author: citysec@protonmail.com (Chantelle)
item.description: hack with us General Body Meetings (Steinman Hall 2M5-2) Thursday, February 7 Thursday, March 21 Thursday, May 2 Club Office hours (Shepherd Hall 277) Thursdays 12:30p - 1:45p There's no office hours on Thursday March 7 Collegiate Competitions National Collegiate Penetration Testing Competition National Cyber League (CTF) Global Cyberlympics National Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition MITRE Cyber Academy (CTF) Panoply (NetSec) NYU’s CSAW (CTF) all other competitions can be found here hack with the community nyc chapter meetings 2600 Empire Hacking NYSEC New York CryptoParty Network DEFCON201 NCC Group Security Forum conferences (presentations are recorded and published on YouTube) HOPE BSidesNYC SummerCon CSAW * free THOTCon * got a great deal for students hackerspaces NYC Resistor Fat Cat Fab Lab Hack Manhattan

item.title: team projects
item.author: citysec@protonmail.com (Chantelle)
item.description: ** If you have a project you wish to advertise for collaboration, email us at citysec@protonmail.com and we’ll add you to the list! join a team, push some code, and hack: NetSec AppSec Operating Systems (kernel-level and user-level) Hardware Hacking Reverse Engineering Malware Analysis Cryptography Open Source Red Team vs. Blue team
